meta.source: NAHB / HUD Residential Life Expectancy Standard
meta.note: Standard benchmarks for calculating depreciation and remaining useful life.

ROOFING.impact_description: Leaks lead to structural rot, mold, and insulation damage.

HVAC.impact_description: Mechanical failure often happens during extreme weather, leading to emergency replacement costs.

PLUMBING.impact_description: Slow leaks behind walls cause silent structural damage and high water bills.

ELECTRICAL.impact_description: Outdated insulation and grounding increase fire risk and exclude property from certain insurance.

WINDOWS.impact_description: Drafty windows increase energy bills by up to 25% and decrease indoor comfort.

WATER_HEATER.impact_description: Sudden failure often results in basement or closet flooding.
